text: Phung thrab theid ka rxi ba dahˌ doy brisuththicı nan pen khx ngxallxhˌ xngkh deiyw swn brrda phu thi yudthux xea brrda phu khumkhrxng xun ca kxallxhˌ doy klaw wa rea midi khearph phakdi phwk khea wentæ pheux thahı rea khea kıl chid tx xallxhˌ thæ cring xallxhˌ ca thrng tadsin rahwang phwk khea nı sing thi phwk khea khadyæng kan nı reuxng nan thæ cring xallxhˌ ca mi thrng china thang kæ phu klaw thec phu mi sanuk buy khun
